title: Sign Up
description: Create a free account to start donating clothes and track your contributions.

title: Choose Clothes
description: Select clean, gently used clothes from your wardrobe for donation.

title: Check Guidelines
description: Review our donation guidelines to ensure the items meet quality standards.

title: Schedule Pickup or Drop-off
description: Book a pickup from your home or drop off at a nearby donation center.

title: Packaging
description: Neatly pack your clothes in a bag or box for easy handling.

title: Sorting
description: Our volunteers sort the clothes by type, size, and season for distribution.

title: Distribution
description: Clothes are delivered to orphanages, shelters, and families in need.

title: See Impact
description: Receive updates on how your donated clothes made a real difference.
